parameter.name: accessKeyId
parameter.description: AWS access key ID.

parameter.name: secretAccessKey
parameter.description: AWS secret access key.

parameter.name: methodType
parameter.description: Type of the HTTP method.

parameter.name: contentLength
parameter.description: Length of the message without the headers according to RFC 2616.

parameter.name: contentType
parameter.description: The content type of the resource in case the request content in the body.

parameter.name: contentMD5
parameter.description: Base64 encoded 128-bit MD5 digest of the message without the headers according to RFC 1864.

parameter.name: expect
parameter.description: This header can be used only if a body is sent to not to send the request body until it recieves an acknowledgment.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: For path-style requests, the value is s3.amazonaws.com. For virtual-style requests, the value is BucketName.s3.amazonaws.com.

parameter.name: isXAmzDate
parameter.description: The current date and time according to the requester.

parameter.name: xAmzSecurityToken
parameter.description: The security token based on whether using Amazon DevPay operations or temporary security credentials.

parameter.name: bucketName
parameter.description: Name of the bucket require.

parameter.name: xAmzAcl
parameter.description: Sets the ACL of the bucket using the specified canned ACL.

parameter.name: xAmzGrantRead
parameter.description: Allows the specified grantee or grantees to list the objects in the bucket.

parameter.name: xAmzGrantWrite
parameter.description: Allows the specified grantee or grantees to create, overwrite, and delete any object in the bucket.

parameter.name: xAmzGrantReadAcp
parameter.description: Allows the specified grantee or grantees to read the bucket ACL.

parameter.name: xAmzGrantWriteAcp
parameter.description: Allows the specified grantee or grantees to write the ACL for the applicable bucket.

parameter.name: xAmzGrantFullControl
parameter.description: Allows the specified grantee or grantees the READ, WRITE, READ_ACP, and WRITE_ACP permissions on the bucket.

parameter.name: xAmzMeta
parameter.description: Field names prefixed with x-amz-meta- contain user-specified metadata.

parameter.name: xAmzServeEncryption
parameter.description: Specifies server-side encryption algorithm to use when Amazon S3 creates an object.

parameter.name: xAmzStorageClass
parameter.description: Storage class to use for storing the object.

parameter.name: xAmzWebsiteLocation
parameter.description: Amazon S3 stores the value of this header in the object metadata.

parameter.name: xAmzMfa
parameter.description: The value is the concatenation of the authentication device's serial number, a space, and the value that is displayed on your authentication device.

parameter.name: xAmzCopySource
parameter.description: The name of the source bucket and key name of the source object, separated by a slash.

parameter.name: xAmzMetadataDirective
parameter.description: Specifies whether the metadata is copied from the source object or replaced with metadata provided in the request.

parameter.name: xAmzCopySourceIfMatch
parameter.description: Copies the object if its entity tag (ETag) matches the specified tag.

parameter.name: xAmzCopySourceIfNoneMatch
parameter.description: Copies the object if its entity tag (ETag) is different than the specified ETag.

parameter.name: xAmzCopySourceIfUnmodifiedSince
parameter.description: Copies the object if it hasn't been modified since the specified time.

parameter.name: xAmzCopySourceIfModifiedSince
parameter.description: Copies the object if it has been modified since the specified time.

parameter.name: xAmzServerSideEncryption
parameter.description: Specifies the server-side encryption algorithm to use when Amazon S3 creates the target object.
